long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Universal Dark Mode: Enhance Your Browsing with a Customizable Dark Theme for Social Media

Are you a night owl or someone sensitive to bright screens? Do you wish all your favorite social media websites had a consistent, eye-friendly dark theme? Look no further! Universal Dark Mode is the perfect solution.

Features:
- Automatically applies a dark mode to all major websites, giving you a uniform browsing experience across platforms like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and more.
- Fully customizable dark theme—adjust color settings to suit your personal preference.
- Lightweight and easy to use with minimal impact on browser performance.
- One-click activation and deactivation for quick toggling between light and dark modes.

Why Use Universal Dark Mode?
- Reduce Eye Strain: Perfect for night-time browsing or extended screen use, Universal Dark Mode helps minimize eye strain caused by bright websites.
- Energy Efficient: Dark modes are not only easier on your eyes, but also help extend battery life, especially on OLED screens.
- Consistency Across Social Media: No more dealing with inconsistent or missing dark modes across different sites. Universal Dark Mode ensures a smooth, dark experience on all the platforms you love.

Permissions:
- Storage: Used to save your customization settings for each site, so you don’t need to adjust them every time.
- activeTab: Allows the extension to apply dark mode to the current tab you’re browsing.
- Scripting: Injects custom styles and scripts to modify web pages and apply the dark theme in real-time.

Take control of your browsing experience and give your eyes the comfort they deserve. Download Universal Dark Mode today and enjoy an uninterrupted, soothing dark theme across all your favorite social media sites.
